newsitem.title: INDIA: India RBI sets 5.0 percent cut-off at repo auction.
newsitem.headline: India RBI sets 5.0 percent cut-off at repo auction.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said it set a cut-off interest rate of 5.0 percent at Saturday's repo auction.
The cut-off at the earlier auction on Thursday was also 5.0 percent. The next repo auction is on Wednesday, January 22, the central bank said.
The RBI said it received 40 bids for 22.90 billion rupees of which it accepted 17 bids for 11.95 billion rupees.
The weighted average repos rate was 4.8720 percent, it said.
